sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic and diced onion, cook until softened. 3. Push garlic and onion to one side of the skillet and crack eggs into the empty space. Scramble until cooked. 4. Add diced carrots and peas, cook until tender. 5. Stir in diced pineapple, peeled and deveined shrimp, and cooked rice. 6. Add soy sauce and fish sauce, toss to combine. 7. Cook until everything is heated through. 8. Garnish with cashew nuts. 9. Serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Pineapple Fried Rice</name> <nutrition>Calories: 450, Protein: 20g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 40g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Dice pineapple, carrots, and onion. 2. Peel and devein shrimp. 3. Cook rice.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c25917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afdc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
